io.sarl.sre.network.boot.configs

Class SreNetworkConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.sre.network.boot.configs.SreNetworkConfig

  • public class SreNetworkConfig
extends Object
    Configuration for the networking features of the SRE.
    Since:
    0.12
    Version:
    io.janusproject.network 0.12.0 20210527-171007
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.network
